content: {"name": "The Open Door COGIC", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Drive-up food pantry, must have vehicle to receive food.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.odcdet.org/eventcalendar/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "12411 Seven Mile East", "address_2": null, "city": "Osborn", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48205", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4350499, "longitude": -82.99782069999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 526-3460", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Drive-up Food Pantry"}]}
